EmailTemplate.name: STH Panel Confirmation_1
EmailTemplate.subject: IAVA's Membership Panel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We look forward to seeing you this Sunday night for IAVA's Membership Panel featuring Col. David Sutherland and Mrs. Holly Petraeus. Please fill out this short form to confirm your seat and to tell us if you will be bringing a guest: http://iava.org/storm-hill-panel-confirmation.
Where: The Westin Washington, DC City Center 1400 M St., NW Washington, DC 20005
When: Sunday, March 25th from 5-7 pm
I look forward to seeing you there.
Best, Jason
Jason Hansman Membership Director Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
